 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקַר‎</span>] **verb** ==bore, pick, dig== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְקַר‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***perforate, bore out, hollow out*** [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>2838</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> be one-eyed [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>645</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְּרוּהָ‎</span> [[Prov.30.17|Prov 30:17]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקוֺר‎</span> [[1Sam.11.3|1Sam 11:3]], both of ***boring***, or ***picking out*** eye (accusative). **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect***. 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּנַקֵּר‎</span> [[Num.16.14|Num 16:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנַקְּרוּ‎</span> [[Judg.16.21|Judg 16:21]] both of ***boring out*** eyes (accusative); ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקַּר‎</span> [[Job.30.17|Job 30:17]] ***he*** (or ***it***, i.e. the night) ***boreth*** my bones <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעָלָ֑י‎</span> (of effects of elephantiasis; [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֻקַּר‎</span>). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֻקַּרְתֶּם‎</span> [[Isa.51.1|Isa 51:1]] the quarry (from which) ***ye were digged***.
